events.name: TNGV Launch Event
events.blurb: On December 2, 2021, we launched the Transforming Narratives of Gun Violence Initiative with a virtual event. The event featured Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley, City Councilor Andrea Campbell, our partners from MGH and the Louis D. Brown Peace Institute, and performances by local artists. Over 270 individuals from Boston and beyond participated.

events.name: Spring Showcase
events.address: 80 Boylston St (lower level of Emerson's Little Building)
events.blurb: Join us as we showcase the projects that Emerson students have co-created with community partners this semester as part of TNGV.
